mapper.insert: insert into food_comment(content, comment_time, food_time, restaurant , discusser) VALUES (#{content},#{day},#{foodTime},#{restaurant},'');
mapper.select: select comment_id, content, comment_time, food_time, restaurant, discusser from food_comment where food_time = #{foodTime} and restaurant=#{restaurant} and visible=1 order by comment_id;

select comment_id, content, comment_time, food_time, restaurant, discusser from food_comment where food_time >= #{weekStart} and food_time <= #{weekEnd} and restaurant=#{restaurant} and visible=1 order by food_time;
